text: Darlene Conley (18 July 1934 â€“ 14 January 2007) was an American actress. She worked most in television soap operas. She played Sally Spectra in the soap opera The Bold and the Beautiful from 1988 to 2007. Conley was born in Chicago. title: Darlene Conley
